name: Formal Cotton Shirt
description: Classic formal shirt crafted from premium cotton with wrinkle-resistant finish. Features regular fit, button-down collar, and professional styling for office wear.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Comfortable denim jeans with classic fit and durable construction. Made from quality cotton blend with timeless styling suitable for casual everyday wear.

name: Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft, breathable cotton t-shirt perfect for sports and casual wear. Features moisture-wicking fabric, comfortable fit, and durable construction for active lifestyles.

name: Silk Saree
description: Elegant pure silk saree with traditional Kanjivaram weaving. Features rich colors, intricate zari work, and luxurious drape perfect for special occasions.

name: Cotton Kurti
description: Comfortable cotton kurti with contemporary design and traditional charm. Features breathable fabric, flattering fit, and versatile styling for everyday ethnic wear.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh upper. Designed for comfort and performance during jogging, training, and everyday activities.

name: Cricket Bat
description: Professional-grade cricket bat made from premium English willow. Features excellent balance, powerful sweet spot, and traditional craftsmanship for serious players.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with cushioned surface for comfortable practice. Made from eco-friendly materials with excellent grip and durability for all yoga styles.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set perfect for home workouts and strength training. Features durable construction, comfortable grip, and versatile weight options for all fitness levels.

name: Camping Tent
description: Spacious camping tent with waterproof design and easy setup. Accommodates multiple people with good ventilation, UV protection, and durable construction for outdoor adventures.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Automatic drip coffee maker with programmable timer and keep-warm function. Brews perfect coffee every time with easy operation and sleek design for your kitchen.

name: Microwave Oven
description: Versatile microwave oven with multiple cooking modes including grill and convection. Features auto-cook menus, child lock, and energy-efficient operation for modern kitchens.

name: Air Purifier
description: Advanced air purifier with HEPA filtration removes 99.97% of airborne particles. Features smart sensors, quiet operation, and coverage for large rooms to ensure clean air.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back. Designed for all-day comfort with sturdy construction and smooth-rolling casters.

name: Study Table
description: Functional study table with spacious work surface and storage compartments. Features durable construction, modern design, and perfect dimensions for students and professionals.

name: Bookshelf
description: Versatile bookshelf with multiple shelves for books, decor, and storage. Features sturdy construction, modern design, and ample space to organize your collection.

name: The Midnight Library
description: Bestselling novel by Matt Haig exploring infinite possibilities and second chances. A heartwarming story about life, regret, and the endless possibilities of the universe.

name: Indian Cooking Mastery
description: Comprehensive guide to authentic Indian cuisine with traditional recipes and modern techniques. Features regional specialties, spice guides, and step-by-step instructions.

name: Atomic Habits
description: Transformative book by James Clear on building good habits and breaking bad ones. Practical strategies backed by science to create lasting positive change in your life.

name: The Lean Startup
description: Epic historical narrative exploring India's rich past from ancient civilizations to modern times. Comprehensive and engaging account by renowned historian John Keay.

name: India: A History
description: Groundbreaking business book by Eric Ries on building successful startups through validated learning. Essential reading for entrepreneurs and innovators worldwide.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 6-hour battery life, and IPX4 water resistance. Features touch controls and premium sound quality.

name: Fire-Boltt Phoenix Pro Smartwatch
description: Fitness smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS tracking, and 7-day battery life. Features multiple sports modes and smartphone notifications.

name: Power Bank
description: 20000mAh portable power bank with fast charging support and dual USB ports. Features LED display and compact design for travel convenience.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, waterproof design, and 12-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor adventures and parties.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with RGB lighting, programmable buttons, and ergonomic design. Features adjustable DPI up to 12000 for competitive gaming.

name: Wireless Keyboard
description: Slim wireless keyboard with backlit keys, long battery life, and quiet typing experience. Compatible with multiple devices via Bluetooth.

name: Phone Case
description: Premium leather phone case with card slots and magnetic closure. Provides excellent protection while maintaining elegant style and functionality.

name: Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection and lightweight titanium frame. Features anti-glare coating and stylish design for all-day comfort.

name: Laptop Bag
description: Professional laptop backpack with padded compartments, water-resistant material, and multiple pockets. Fits laptops up to 15.6 inches.

name: Watch
description: Classic analog watch with stainless steel case, leather strap, and water resistance. Features precise quartz movement and elegant design.

name: Moisturizer
description: Hydrating face moisturizer with hyaluronic acid and SPF 30. Provides all-day moisture protection and anti-aging benefits for healthy, glowing skin.

name: Shampoo
description: Nourishing shampoo with argan oil for dry and damaged hair. Features sulfate-free formula, deep conditioning, and helps restore hair's natural shine.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple cleaning modes, pressure sensor, and 2-minute timer. Includes travel case and replacement brush heads.

name: Hair Dryer
description: Professional hair dryer with ionic technology, multiple heat settings, and cool shot button. Features lightweight design and fast drying performance.

name: boAt Airdopes 131 TWS Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with 60H playtime, BEAST mode for low latency gaming, IPX4 water resistance, and instant voice assistant access.

name: Realme Buds Air 3 Neo
description: Wireless earbuds with 30H total playback, fast charging, AI ENC for calls, and 10mm dynamic bass boost driver for immersive sound.

name: Mi 10000mAh Power Bank 3i
description: Fast charging power bank with 18W fast charging, dual USB output, 10000mAh capacity, and 12-layer circuit protection for safe charging.

name: Portronics Konnect L 1.2M USB Cable
description: Fast charging USB Type-C cable with 3A current support, data sync capability, durable braided design, and universal compatibility.

name: Ambrane 20W Fast Charger
description: 20W USB-C PD fast charger with universal compatibility, compact design, multiple safety protections, and efficient charging technology.

name: Zebronics Zeb-Sound Bomb 1 Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 5W output, 6H playtime, FM radio, AUX input, and compact design perfect for outdoor activities.

name: Noise ColorFit Pro 4 Alpha Smartwatch
description: Advanced smartwatch with 1.78" AMOLED display, 60Hz refresh rate, 100+ sports modes, health monitoring, and 7-day battery life.

name: Fire-Boltt Phoenix Pro Smartwatch
description: Premium smartwatch with 1.39" HD display, Bluetooth calling, 120+ sports modes, SpO2 monitoring, and IP67 water resistance.

name: Redgear A-15 Wired Gaming Headset
description: Professional gaming headset with 7.1 surround sound, noise-canceling microphone, RGB lighting, and comfortable over-ear design.

name: Logitech B175 Wireless Mouse
description: Reliable wireless mouse with 12-month battery life, plug-and-play setup, comfortable design, and precise optical tracking.

name: HP 32GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive
description: High-speed USB 3.0 flash drive with 32GB storage, compact metal design, fast data transfer, and universal compatibility.

name: Quantum QHM7468 2.4GHz Wireless Keyboard Mouse Combo
description: Wireless keyboard and mouse combo with 2.4GHz connectivity, spill-resistant keyboard, optical mouse, and long battery life.

name: Portronics Toad 20 Car Charger
description: Dual USB car charger with 3.4A output, smart charging technology, LED indicator, and compact design for all vehicles.

name: Syska 10000mAh Power Bank
description: Compact power bank with 10000mAh capacity, dual USB output, LED indicators, and multiple safety protections for reliable charging.

name: Intex IT-2202 SUF OS 2.1 Computer Speakers
description: 2.1 multimedia speakers with subwoofer, 25W RMS output, volume control, bass control, and 3.5mm audio input for computers.

name: Redmi A3
description: Budget smartphone with 6.71" HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G36 processor, 5000mAh battery, dual rear camera, and Android 14 Go edition.

name: Samsung Galaxy M04
description: Entry-level smartphone with 6.5" HD+ display, MediaTek Helio P35 processor, 5000mAh battery, dual camera setup, and One UI Core.

name: Realme C55
description: Stylish smartphone with 6.72" FHD+ display, MediaTek Helio G88 processor, 5000mAh battery, 64MP AI camera, and realme UI 4.0.

name: POCO C65
description: Performance-focused smartphone with 6.74" HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G85 processor, 5000mAh battery, 50MP camera, and MIUI 14.

name: Infinix Hot 30i
description: Trendy smartphone with 6.6" HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G36 processor, 5000mAh battery, 48MP AI camera, and XOS 13 based on Android 13.

name: Tecno Spark 10 Pro
description: Feature-rich smartphone with 6.8" FHD+ display, MediaTek Helio G88 processor, 5000mAh battery, 48MP triple camera, and HiOS 13.

name: Lava Blaze 2 5G
description: 5G-enabled smartphone with 6.56" HD+ display, MediaTek Dimensity 6020 processor, 5000mAh battery, 50MP camera, and clean Android 13.

name: itel A70
description: Ultra-budget smartphone with 6.6" HD+ display, UNISOC Tiger T603 processor, 4000mAh battery, dual camera, and Android 14 Go edition.
